participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and active, Emily loves to engage in physical activities and socialize with others. She's dedicated to her fitness and enjoys running in her free time.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is blue. i enjoy sports such as running. i'm married. i am a vegetarian.

participant_2.name: Jacob Thompson
participant_2.personality: Jacob is a hands-on person with a creative side. He enjoys nature and finds peace in gardening. Although he's a bit introverted, he values deep connections with friends and family.
participant_2.background: i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i just got a job working in a gas station. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.
